name: Thomas Städter
background: Thomas Städter serves as Head of Documentaries at PHOENIX, focusing on documentary films and current affairs. They seek political documentaries with journalistic depth and history connecting past to present.
thematic_priorities: In-depth political documentaries with journalistic integrity
Historical documentaries connecting past events to current issues
Current affairs documentaries providing context and analysis
format_specifications: Preferred format: Singles (45–60 minutes) or series (2–3 episodes)
budget_parameters: Documentary: €80K–€180K per hour; Specialist Factual: €90K–€200K per hour
technical_requirements: Broadcast/streaming standards; details provided upon commissioning
Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Two-page treatment with premise and journalistic approach
additional_info: Diversity emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; encouragement of sustainable production practices; support for projects from across German regions (where applicable); open to pitches from independent producers/companies.
